title: Update regarding NXS
story_body:
Nuvectra Corporation (NXS) Acquisition Rumors Emerge

According to people familiar with the matter, rumors have begun circulating regarding a potential acquisition of Nuvectra Corporation (NXS). Details of the rumored transaction, including the identity of the potential acquirer and the terms of the deal, remain unconfirmed.

As of 09:45 EDT, sources close to the matter have indicated that discussions are ongoing, although it is unclear whether these talks will result in a definitive agreement. Nuvectra Corporation has not publicly commented on the rumors, and the company's representatives have not responded to requests for confirmation.

It is essential to note that these rumors are unsubstantiated and should be treated with caution. While the sources claiming knowledge of the potential acquisition are credible, the information has not been officially verified by Nuvectra Corporation or any other parties involved.

At 10:10 EDT, trading activity in NXS shares increased, with the stock price experiencing moderate volatility. However, it is unclear whether this movement is directly related to the acquisition rumors or other market factors.

This story will be updated as more information becomes available.
